scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains 8 documents about legal matters in Scott County, VA. There are 5 bonds whereby citizens agree to be liable for performance of office holders or appointees, a deposition about jury service, and 2 items about law books. The documents range from 1819 until the late 1860s.
